org.cougaar.mts.std.debug
Interface StepService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface StepService
extends Service

This MTS-internal Service can be used to 'single-step' a message through the stations. Its only real use so far is through a Swing gui, but in principle it could have other uses (e.g., @{link StepperControlExampleAspect}). The implementation is in the StepperAspect.

Method Summary
 void pause(MessageAddress destination)
          Pause processing to the given destination.
 void pauseAll()
          Pause processing to all destinations.
 void resume(MessageAddress destination)
          Resume processing to the given destination.
 void resumeAll()
          Resume processing to all destinations.
 void step(MessageAddress destination)
          Allow the frozen message (if any) to proceed, for the given destination.
 void stepAll()
          Allow the frozen message (if any) to proceed, for all destinations.
 

Method Detail

pauseAll

void pauseAll()
Pause processing to all destinations. The next message to each destination will be frozen until a subsequent resume or step.

pause

void pause(MessageAddress destination)
Pause processing to the given destination. The next message to that destination will be frozen until a subsequent resume or step.

resumeAll

void resumeAll()
Resume processing to all destinations.

resume

void resume(MessageAddress destination)
Resume processing to the given destination.

stepAll

void stepAll()
Allow the frozen message (if any) to proceed, for all destinations.

step

void step(MessageAddress destination)
Allow the frozen message (if any) to proceed, for the given destination.
